Posted By: VarteDod (9/23/2011 5:21:24 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
**Alsebra** has the right idea here. You can run this as a one-of to REPEAT the effect multiple times on a turn, churning away your library until you've got a library full of flashback cards/zombies, or you can make sure you have one or two [Laboratory Maniac](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Laboratory Maniac)s in your hand (along with a counterspell or two, of course) as a risky win condition.   
  
I think the flavor works better if you run this in multiples. A crazed phantasm skittering through a mansion full of mirrors, making you lose your mind, and your spells as a consequence. Really good. 3.5 for combo potential, bumped up to 4 for flavor.
posts.html:
Alsebra has the right idea here. You can run this as a one-of to REPEAT the effect multiple times on a turn, churning away your library until you've got a library full of flashback cards/zombies, or you can make sure you have one or two Laboratory Maniacs in your hand (along with a counterspell or two, of course) as a risky win condition.

I think the flavor works better if you run this in multiples. A crazed phantasm skittering through a mansion full of mirrors, making you lose your mind, and your spells as a consequence. Really good. 3.5 for combo potential, bumped up to 4 for flavor.

Posted By: dreanor (9/25/2011 9:13:01 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Faralay: If you're looking for the [Laboratory Maniac](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Laboratory Maniac) alt win condition, only run one Mirror-Mad Phantasm, copy it with something like [Evil Twin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Evil Twin) or [Cackling Counterpart](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cackling Counterpart), then activate it. Because it explicitly states that you're looking for a card named Mirror-Mad Phantasm, you'll never find it if it's been copied or is being represented by a token (as per the FAQ).   
  
And yes, protect the Lab Maniac with everything you got. [Mask of Avacyn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mask of Avacyn), counters, whatever.
posts.html:
@Faralay: If you're looking for the Laboratory Maniac alt win condition, only run one Mirror-Mad Phantasm, copy it with something like Evil Twin or Cackling Counterpart, then activate it. Because it explicitly states that you're looking for a card named Mirror-Mad Phantasm, you'll never find it if it's been copied or is being represented by a token (as per the FAQ).

And yes, protect the Lab Maniac with everything you got. Mask of Avacyn, counters, whatever.

posts.post_content: I'm loving this card. I have a deck that relies of Opponent Mill and self mill in unison (Recursion through Sheoldred and Creature/Artifact recursion from Geth) And its weak point was always getting my stuff into the grave first. Now I can get a good third or half of my deck into the grave for Sheoldred shinanagans with M-M Phantasm

posts.post_content:
This card is three things for me:   
  
Really really good for designing around... (If copiously expensive to play)  
Two... Totally garbage in a pre-release where you drew nothing with any synergy with it...  
And three, the only mythic in the set that I got while sitting just right of someone who got [Army of the Damned](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Army of the Damned) and this card my first opponent had [Balefire Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Balefire Dragon)...
